channel.title: 508 Stat Editing
channel.description: On my 508 server its object training and i want to know if there is a way to make it so that i can make all my other skills to be 99 You can only get combat skills atm and i want the other skillcapes and the 99 in the stat so i can use the emote its a 508 server some help please?

item.title: 508 Stat Editing
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

you have to add actions for all the right cases, so for example, you have case 9999(i just made that up don’t try to look up case 9999)

case [b]9999[/b]:
9999 would be the object id of the object you want to give the skill xp
so

case 9999:
addSkillXp([XPamount],[NumberofSKill])
break;

you have to find the skill ID or the number of the skill, you can find it in a character file, but it’s not very efficient

Read full topic
